name: Mother Treesa: Root of Evil
description:
Root Knowledge 

Play as a hive within a network of trees. You, the mother tree, are being attacked by lumber jacks. Expand and protect your tree network with your skills. Try to last as long as possible. We're "rooting" for you!

Controls are in the game. 

Team
  • Benji: Designer, Level designer
  • Janrinke: Composer , SFX designer
  • Igor: Programming
  • Eyal: Programming, Project Lead
  • Shiimosa: 3D Character artist, Animator
  • Hani: Programer
  • Sky: Designer, UI Designer
  • Alessandro: 3D environmental artist
